General.Name: Senmiao Technology Ltd
General.Description: Senmiao Technology Limited engages in the automobile transaction and related services business in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Automobile Transaction and Related Services, and Online Ride-Hailing Platform Services segments. It also offers car rental services to individual customers; and auto finance solutions through financing leases. In addition, the company engages in automobile sales comprising sale of new purchased or used cars; and the provision of supporting services, as well as auto management and guarantee services provided to online ride-hailing drivers. Further, it provides new energy vehicles leasing, automobile purchase, and management services, such as ride-hailing driver training, assisting with a series of administrative procedures, and other consulting services, as well as credit assessment, installation of GPS devices, ride-hailing driver qualification, and other administrative procedures. Additionally, the company operates Xixingtianxia, an online ride-hailing platform that enables qualified ride-hailing drivers to provide transportation services mainly in Chengdu, Changsha, Guangzhou, and other cities in China. Senmiao Technology Limited was founded in 2014 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.
